summary: App with a new monetization page named "LOVE THE LIQUID" that embeds the Ko-fi page and includes a button link plus a title.
architectural_notes: Monetization will be implemented as a dedicated page containing an embedded Ko-fi view plus a button link to https://ko-fi.com/painparadise.

existing_features.title: Create a new public page titled "LOVE THE LIQUID" that includes (1) a prominent title at the top and (2) an embedded view of https://ko-fi.com/painparadise on the page.
Add a clear call-to-action button on the "LOVE THE LIQUID" page that links to https://ko-fi.com/painparadise.

Add routing for the new "LOVE THE LIQUID" page using the existing TanStack Router pattern in frontend/src/App.tsx, with a stable, human-readable path (e.g., "/love-the-liquid") and lazy-loading like other non-landing pages.

Add a navigation entry for the new "LOVE THE LIQUID" page to both the desktop header navigation (frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout.tsx) and the mobile menu (frontend/src/components/layout/MobileNav.tsx).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add new monetization page "LOVE THE LIQUID" with embedded Ko-fi (https://ko-fi.com/painparadise), a button link, and a title
